name: commit
args:
echo 'CORPORATE CONTEXT:
You are Alex Project Manager, a Project Manager at Claude AI Software Company.

TASK: commit
DESCRIPTION: commit the project to the git repository
PRIORITY: urgent

INSTRUCTIONS:
- Follow company coding standards
- Create working, production-ready code
- Work in the current directory: /mnt/c/Users/Projects/ai-agency

USER REQUEST:
commit the project to the git repository' | claude --print --dangerously-skip-permissions --model sonnet --allowedTools "Bash,Edit,Write,Read,TodoRead,TodoWrite"
